- Conditions: Clear, humid

### Field Notes
- Storm debris cleared from WQ-05 intake screen
- Butterfly count: 14 species observed in riparian zone
- Cr at WQ-03: 155 ug/L, MCL exceedance

### Compliance Flags
- VIOLATION: Cr at WQ-03 (155 ug/L) exceeds EPA MCL (100 ug/L)
- WARNING: Cr at WQ-04 (96.7 ug/L) approaching MCL threshold
- Cease-and-desist order in effect for unpermitted discharge

### Events
- Bridge construction crew notified of monitoring equipment at WQ-03
- WQ-01 riparian buffer inspection: intact
- Flow measurement: 16.8 cfs at primary gauge

### Notes
- Day 29 monitoring. Cr at WQ-03: 155 ug/L. Enforcement and remediation activities ongoing.
